content: a breezy spring day walk through a field of flowers inspired me to create this one skein scarf the asymmetrical crescent shape and the lace details gives it a feminine ethereal look the cashmere yarn provides the softness of the touch the lace work mimics water lilies in a monet like pond and subtle flowers add to the gentle feeling of this scarf happy knitting **pattern error** for those who downloaded the pattern during the free pattern week unfortunately we are not able to send the updated version below you will find the corrections there are 3 corrections in the alternating leaf section r5 repeat to the last 9 st r16 p2 yo p5 * p6 yo p1 p2tog repeat from to the last 5 st p3 p2tog r17 k3 * k2tog k1 yo k6 repeat from to last 9 st k2tog k1 yo k4 yo k1 yo k1 122 st r21 is omitted continue to the garter section
